data.actual_result: It shows as separate message for a split second
data.expected_result: When you put your mention between codeblock, it should merge with previous messages and NOT show as separate message with date and time even for a split second
data.short_description: Mentions enclosed in single codeblock appear as separate messages for split second before merging with the previous ones as a group.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel and type a message of one word in one line. - Notice after you send 6 messages each in one line, in a row, the 7th Message is a separate one with date and time on it. - Notice if you mention yourself, it always makes a new message with date and time. - Now type one message per line upto 2-3 messages. Mention yourself and put it between single codeblock.
